name: On 'Men's Jeans' page pick filter size, check that it is visible, pick one checkbox, check that the filter has appeared

steps.name: Go to 'Men's Jeans' section, scroll to size and click
click on 'Jeans' inside 'Men's' section with waiting for presence ofd element
scroll to 'Size' button and click on it
Check if 'Size' area is visible after clicking the size button
Select size checkbox and close adverts modal, if appears
check if there is a modal layer with shadow root and close it
check if there is a modal layer with shadow root and close it
scroll to filter '28x30' and check if it was applied and visible
